text: Tidak menyangka di tengah keriuhan suasana Ubud akan menemukan tempat yang menawarkan ketenangan. Byasa akan membantu anda yang ingin relax setelah menjalani rutinitas sehari-hari. Lokasinya dekat jalan raya, tapi juga agak masuk dan juga berbatasan dengan sawah. Saya sangat terkesan dengan fasilitas di Byasa. Kolam renangnya dipelihara dengan baik, tidak akan terasa banyak klorin seperti kolam renang pada umumnya. Breakfastnya enak, nasi dan mie gorengnya, tanpa msg dan banyak sayuran. Anda juga bisa request afternoon tea sambil menikmati waktu sore yang tenang. Di dekat Byasa juga ada minimarket yang akan membantu jika kita perlu barang-barang tertentu. Overall, Byasa akan menyediakan sekeping ketenangan yang akan menjadi memori tak terlupakan.
title: Serenity

text: Hotel dengan keramahan staff yang luar biasa, taman yang tertata sangat rapi dan bersih. Kamarnya luas, bersih, tapi sayang ketika masuk tercium bau lembab, saya minta pengharum ruangan, tapi hanya membantu sebentar, ada beberapa laron dan semut masuk, tapi menurut saya wajar sih, waktu itu kan musim hujan, di sekitar banyak pohon dan sawah. kolam renang bersih banget. Breakfast paket ala carte, nasi/mie goreng, telur, pancake, buah, kopi/teh, rasanya enaaak, sayang buat anak kena charge 60 rb. Saya pesan via ag**a, di deskripsinya kamar mandi ada bath tub, padahal tidak ada. Buat yang mau nyari ketenangan, tempat ini bisa jadi pilihan
title: Hotel yang Tenang

owner_response.text:
Yth Ibu Dee M,

Kami ingin mengucapkan terima kasih atas waktu dan berbagi pengalaman anda di TripAdvisor. Dengan senang hati kami mengetahui bahwa anda menikmati masa menginap yang tenang  dan kami senang mendengar bahwa layanan kami sesuai harapan anda. 
Kami mohon maaf atas terganggunya kenyamanan Ibu dengan bau lembab di kamar di karenakan ada retakan di tembok dimana sudah kami perbaiki.
Harga kamar sudah termasuk sarapan dua orang dewasa dan anak di atas 12 th kami kenakan charge 60 rb.

Salam
Pande & Ayu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We were not disappointed at all with our four nights at Byasa Ubud. The welcome is incredible, both from Pande and all its staff. They are all very caring and do everything to make the stay as comfortable as possible. The hotel is very quiet even though it is located along a busy street. The building is located back in lush greenery and is completely sheltered from noise. The breakfast is delicious and plentiful. It is possible to rent scooters on-site at a very reasonable price (70000IDR / day). The friendliness of the staff is a real plus. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and overlook the swimming pool. It is clean, and the temperature is pleasant. Very good value for money.
title: Warmest place

text:
My partner and I stayed at this hotel for five nights in September and were blown away by the hotel, food and service.

The hotel is located around 15 minutes walk from the Monkey Sanctuary and main streets which meant we were in a quiet location but getting around was easy. The hotel is kept in an exceptional condition with the restaurant, pool and each hotel room all overlooking rice fields. The pool gets sun all day and is lovely and warm, even in the evening! Our room was large, clean and provided everything we could need. The bed was huge and extremely comfortable too! There is a free water dispenser which is a great perk not provided at many hotels. The wifi is very quick and can be accessed everywhere around the hotel.

The service at this hotel won’t be beaten. Every member of staff we spoke to was so friendly and helpful. I didn’t catch his name (sorry!) but special thanks to the staff member who waited for us and collected us from the airport and didn’t get back home until 4am, he was great throughout our stay.

At Byasa you call reception using your own mobile phone provided on arrival to order breakfast for a time that suits you. The breakfast is varied, well cooked and well presented. The staff member who delivered our breakfast was great too, always so friendly. The hotel offers free afternoon tea every day and we had this by the pool. The tea includes traditional balinese treats which were delicious.

In summary, this was one of the best hotel stays I have ever had and will be a very hard one to beat - thank you so much Byasa family.

Alex and Ben
title: Service won’t be beaten

text:
I don’t say this lightly, when I say this is the best all around hotel experience I have ever had. 

Location-wise, the hotel is about a 10-15 minute walk from central Ubud but it is still incredibly quiet and peaceful. The grounds are beautiful and there are a few friendly cats around who like to cuddle. 

The hotel staff are incredibly friendly, helpful and attentive. I’ve not experienced better service. They offer complementary breakfast which is very filling and delicious. The pool is very clean and a nice temperature. There is a complimentary water cooler to fill bottles. There is complementary WiFi and the signal was excellent. Upon request, they also arranged transport for us from the airport to the hotel with a private driver at a very reasonable and cheap rate. 

The room is spacious, clean, with a comfortable bed, pillows and nice bathroom. We had a room with a balcony overlooking the pool and rice terraces which was icing on the cake. 

We would absolutely recommend anyone coming to Ubud to stay here and would stay here again.
title: Best hotel experience ever

text:
I stayed eight nights at Byassa with my daughter in February.  Absolutely everything was spotless. The rooms were large and modern with air conditioning.  We were provided with mobile phones to order room service and to take out with us should we need help if we got lost or needed a taxi home which made us feel safe in unfamiliar Ubud.
They arranged a tour to East Bali with lovely guide called Alit, which we really enjoyed.
We loved the pool, the view of the paddy fields and jungle, and the amazing sounds of the wildlife as soon as dusk fell. 
We could walk safely into town to eat at the many, varied restaurants  or stay in and enjoy a beer or two and some tasty home cooked food.
We were looked after so well by Pande and Ayu.  Nothing was too much trouble.
Guste and Dharmah served us banana pancakes (and much more) every morning with a smile, and he even took the trouble to go on his scooter to retrieve our sunglasses which we left in a taxi! 
Thank you for our lovely holiday!
title: The staff at Byasa make this hotel special.

This was my second stay with the wonderful Pande at Byasa.  I only regret writing this review as Byasa is such a wonderful hidden secret, that I don't want others to discover it!

Pande and his team are remarkable.  I first stayed at Byasa when it first opened.  The garden still needed growing in, the restaurant still hadn't opened.  But it was still a magical oasis away from the motorbike chaos of Ubud.

Travelling back for a quick 2 night stay, I was welcomed with open arms, like a long-lost family friend, and even given the same room I stayed in 2 years ago.

Highly recommended.  Great atmosphere (thrilled that under 12's aren't allowed), and glad I went back.

Will be back again.

text:
지인 추천으로 Byasa를 예약했고 4박 하였습니다.
실외 수영장도 있어 아이들과 잠깐식 수영하는 것도 좋았고 가제보도 두곳이 있어 아침식사 와 오후에 제공하는 커피와 케익을 즐기는 것도 좋았습니다.
일하시는 스탭분들이 모두 인상도 좋고 항상 웃는 얼굴이라 잠깐식 얘기도 나눌수 있어 좋았구요.
사장님과 사모님이 우붓주변 관광지나 맛집 소개도 해주고 래프팅 같은 액티비티 예약도 대신 해주는 등 많은 도움을 받았습니다.
마치 예전부터 알던 분들 같은 느낌도 들구요. 시간 여유있으면 같이 차한잔 마시며 얘기 나눠도 좋을 것 같았습니다.
호텔 지은지 얼마 안된것 처럼 깨끗하구 벌레 걱정도 했는데 전혀 없었구요.
빨래 서비스도 저렴했고 오전에 나갔다 오후에 들어오면 건조해서 예쁘게 개어서 놔둘 정도로 빨랐구요.
마주칠때 마다 불편한거 없냐고 물어보고 챙겨준 덕분에 편안했습니다..
오토바이 픽업은 무료로 태워주고 차량픽업은 저렴한 가격에 서비스합니다. 호텔비 정산할때 한꺼번에 비용처리 되구요. 
우붓시내에서 차로 10분 이내 거리고 도보 30분 이내거리에 위치하고 있어 교통편리하고 메인 도로에서 비켜 있어 조용 했구요.
체크아웃 하는날 아침 7시에 호텔에서 나서야 했는데 아침식사도 6시 30분에 맞춰주시는 등 너무 감사했습니다. 
우붓이 워낙 매력적인 곳이라 가족끼리 다시 오겠노라 약속했는데 그때도 당연히 비아사에 와야 할것 같아요.
좋은 추억 많이 만들고 가서 너무 행복했던 시간이었습니다. 
Thank you all for everything. It was one of the best time of my life.
title: 추천하고 싶은 숙소 / 우붓

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Our stay at Byasa was hands-down the best experience we have ever had at a hotel before! Honestly, I don't really even have anything bad to say about it! 

Here are some of the great things about this place:

-SUPER clean and beautiful rooms! The staff services them twice a day and cleans every little nook and cranny! The wood accents are gorgeous! 

-There are only nine rooms total so we liked not having to deal with hoards of other tourists or loud screaming families. 

-THE STAFF!!! I cannot say enough about the hospitality that we received at Byasa! Each and every staff member knew us by our first name on day one and seemed genuinely concerned about our happiness and comfort level throughout our entire stay. We actually felt like we were staying with family! 

-Excellent (and huge) breakfast included. 

-Tea time each day with local treats included! Yum! 

-Gorgeous property!!! The landscaping is beautiful and the hotel overlooks a bright green rice terrace. 

-Ultra clean and serene pool area.

-Super quiet location even though it is tucked behind a very busy road. We felt safe and secluded even though we were not too far from one of the main drags. 

-You can't beat the price for the value...this place is a SERIOUS steal! 

Thank you Byasa for such a great stay!  We hope to see you again someday!
title: We would give Byasa a ten star rating if we could!

text:
Byasa Hotel is just a few minutes walk to the main streets of Ubud, actually the best compromise between the distance from the noisy city center and the quiet of the nature. 

The hotel has just a few rooms, very clean and fully equipped. The garden and the pool outside are incredibly relaxing, you can have a nap between the sounds coming from frogs and birds :-) but the best part of Byasa is the incredibly kind and warm staff. They helped us with all the infos and also gave us as a phone with Indonesian sim to use in case of need when we were outside. You can also rent a scooter, the easiest and the best way to visit Ubud and surroundings. 

We didn’t have time to have lunch or dinner there but breakfast was delicious. One of the best accomodation we have ever had in our lives! Actually after visiting other cities in Bali we wanted to come back to Ubud to spend our last days here in the peace of Byasa hotel.
