text:
This hotel is such a lovely, quiet and charming place in the huzzle of Ubud. It is run by a lovely family and has the nicest staff you could imagine. Breakfast was sooo tasty, and the pool facing the rice field is a great thing to have after a hot day in the city centre. All is so clean and well decorated, there is no single thing we could complain about:). 
I had a small accident and they all were so kind and helpful and really cared about me/us, we really felt as a part of the hotel family.
Thanks to all of you, Pande, your lovely wife, Kade, Gus De and all of the other lovely employees, always helpful and smiling.
Pande, we couldn't say goodbye personally :Thanks again for your kindness and honesty and for making our stay that memorable.
Hope we see again one day.
All the best for you, your family and your hotel.
Rida and Steffi
title: Best hotel with the nicest staff on earth

text: We have stayed 6 nights at Byasa Ubud. The location was handy to Monkey Forest Park, Ubud Palace and the Yoga Barn....by foot. The room is spacious , comfortable and very clean. There is a good size swimming pool. Having breakfast in the beautiful garden every morning was pleasant. And we had a few times dinner at Byasa too, that’s yummy and rather healthy. Staff are always friendly and willing to help, especially Dalma, who is exceptional. Highly recommended this place.

text:
私は、このホテルで1人で、2019年7月30日と31日の2泊した。
Sense of place I know though it's the place where I have come for the first time.The friendly owner and staff who don't think they met for the first time though it was meeting.The breakfast I had is bread, sausage, an omelet, orange juice and coffee.'nasi goreng' where Satay and vegetables were added to lunch.
Satay with which a bittersweet a little rich source was tied is outstanding in the chemistry with nasi goreng!
Sparerib of a pig of dinner and the grill which is a chicken again are recommended by all means.
It's very regrettable that there was only beer from Bali for alcohol.I wanted to drink white wine and red wine.
The vegetables and the fruit added to each dish were very fresh and good!
I didn't want to have a stomachache in Bali, so I decided not to eat fresh greens.But the vegetables from this hotel are no problem by all means!So I ordered green salad.It was very good!
The room is very clean.A refrigerator is also equipped well with, and a water server is also put in the garden.The soap of the hot shower and the fragrance and the clean restroom are perfect.My body tired with movement, I slept by a clean bed soft.It's defended against these security in a hotel and noise in the town because it's at the place where I waited for the inside a moment from a main road though it's in the center of UBUD.

ぜひこれを読んだ貴方はこのホテルを体験するべきです。おすすめですよ～

text:
세번째 우붓 방문입니다. 이제는 우붓에 그만와도 될 것 같단 생각을 그동안 하였으나, 이제는 한번 더 오고싶도록 만들어준 곳입니다. 
Owner부부인 Mr.Pande 와 Mrs.Ayu 를 비롯하여 모든 스태프들로부터 친절이 느껴집니다. 교육된 친절이 아닌, 진심으로부터의 친절이라 마음이 너무 편안합니다. 
9개의 객실로 구성된 호텔은 적절한 넓이와 깊이의 수영장을 가지고 있으며 관리가 잘되어서 매우 깨끗합니다. 수영장 앞 Rice field의 뷰는 매우 아름답고 정원 또한 아름답고 거닐기 좋습니다. 소규모 객실수의 호텔이라 믿기 어려울 정도의 멋지고 잘 관리된 시설입니다. 
객실은 매우 넓어 두 아이를 포함한 총 4명의 가족이 머물기에 부족함이 없으며, 방과 욕실, 침구상태 또한 매우 깨끗합니다. 
우붓왕궁으로부터는 다소 거리는 있으나 대신 우붓의 평화로운 정취를 느낄 수 있으며, 주변에 훌륭한 식당과 마트, laundry shop, coworking place가 있어 불편함을 느낄수없습니다. 요가반으로 가는 지름길도 있어, 아내는 매일 그곳에서 요가를 즐길 수 있었습니다. 지름길도 호텔직원이 직접 동행하며 알려주었습니다.
조식은 a la carte의 형식이며 starter, main, desert, drink를 각각 고르는데 각각 가짓수가 많지는 않지만 매우 깔끔하고 맛있으며, 룸서비스 또한 합리적인 가격과 맛을 가지고 있습니다.
그럼에도 숙박료 또한 매우 합리적입니다. 
우리는 21일간의 이번 휴가중 발리에 도착한 첫 5일을 머문 후 길리를 다녀왔으며 다시 우붓으로 돌아와 몽키포레스트 스트릿의 5성호텔에 3일간 머물렀습니다. 그리고 다시 byasa로 돌아와 스미냑으로 떠나기전까지 3일을 더 머물렀습니다. Full booking이 아니었다면 스미냑으로 안가고 더 머물고 싶을 정도로 나의 집, 그리고 가족과 함께 한듯 행복한 시간이었습니다. 
이곳의 모든 분들 덕분에 이번 발리에서의 휴가는 매우 행복했습니다. 우리가족 모두 byasa 때문에 우붓을 다시 방문하고 싶다 말합니다.
혼자만 알고 싶은 곳이지만, Pande's family 와 호텔의  staff 모두 행복했으면 하는 바램에 이 글을 씁니다.
모두 다시 만나요 꼭.

text: We have been in many 5 star brand name hotels over the years and have never once received the type of service we received at The Byasa during our recent stay. From check in, to room service, morning breakfast to organizing airport transfers and day trips, we felt at home interacting with the wonderful staff at Byasa. They totally aim to please. Safe, clean and spacious and air conditioned rooms with wonderful views of the rice paddies- I spent every morning sitting in the balcony listening to the wonderful sounds of nature. There is no traffic noise at all. The beds and pillows are so comfortable! Excellent choice of restaurants, massage spa centres, local supermarkets and money exchange shops are a convenient 5 minute walk from the hotel. We were given a complimentary local cell phone which was very useful in making reservations and contacting reception. Our daughter loved the pool and my wife was really touched when the entire hotel staff showed up with a cake to wish her Happy Birthday. In the end, we really did not feel like leaving. We will definitely be back soon!

text:
My wife and I stayed at Byasa Ubud for 4 nights and what an incredibly positive experience we had.  All the 5* TripAdvisor reviews are true.  Byasa Ubud is situated off a busy main road, down a small lane and backs onto a local rice field.  All rooms have a view of the pool and rice field.  Our room was on the 3rd floor as we requested and was very clean and had lots of amenities.  We were lucky enough to stay here when the locals were harvesting their rice.  When you are on the grounds, you forget you are in the busy heart of Ubud, you feel like you are in the country.

From the moment we arrived and during our morning breakfasts, our regular tourist inquiries and right up until we checked out, owners Pande, his wife Ayu and their staff made us feel so relaxed and comfortable, we felt like old friends or family.  Great location, easy walking distance to attractions, shopping and restaurants.  However, the food at Byasa Ubud is also delicious and we opted to dine in a lot of the time.  Their chicken wings are really yummy!

This is the 5th year my wife and I have been travelling through different Asian countries and Byasa Ubud is now one of the top two boutique hotels we have stayed at in our travels.  Thanks so much Pande, Ayu, Dekyo, Dharma and Gusde.  You made our stay in Ubud a very memorable one!
title: An Incredible Oasis in Ubud!

This little oasis in the middle of Ubud is a dream. The rooms are HUGE - including the bathroom.
There’s free bottled water and a water station for refilling, as well as super cheap drinks in the mini-bar. Our hosts could not have been kinder - they really looked after us, especially when my husband came down with the dreaded Bali belly :-(
As the Byasa is a little way from the centre of Ubud (about a 20min walk to the palace and main shopping/eating district) we hired a scooter from the hotel with no trouble.
The swimming pool and outdoor breakfast area is clean, comfortable, and relaxing - I’d highly recommend this place for anyone’s stay in Ubud :-)

text:
I cannot think of anything bad to say about the Byasa Ubud hotel and it's staff.  They cannot do enough for you, even if it is something silly like having an extra teabag at breakfast. What a lovely week we had there and so glad we didn't go anywhere else. 
We used the hotel airport pickup and not a single complaint from the driver when it took us over an hour to get through immigration at 02.00 in the morning. Then about a 40 minute drive to the hotel so by the time we arrived we were very tired but the manager stayed up to greet us and we did the check-in the next morning. You can barter with a local taxi and might find it a little bit cheaper, but don't bother, use the hotel airport pickup.
Likewise, we hired a scooter for 3 days from the hotel and it was just as cheap as in town and you are assured of a serviced & totally legal machine with everything working. With the traffic in Bali, you cannot take chances.
A lovely pool over looking rice fields, afternoon tea (if you are at the hotel when it's being served), nice breakfast. 
Only a 5 minute walk to the start of the Ubud main street with bars, shops, restaurants etc.
We loved it. You will too....
title: Relaxing hotel, nice pool & great staff

text:
Byasa Ubud hotel is a small hidden jewel in Ubud, about 15 min walking from the city centre. We spent 5 nights there while touring the north and east of the island, as well as Ubud itself. Let me start of with a clarification: this is probably the best value you can get for this money - and not because this is a cheap corporate run 4/5 star hotel, but because it is a local run hotel with the nicest(best?) staff I've ever seen. But back to that later. We found the rooms very spacious and in excellent condition. They all have a balcony/view to the pool and rice paddies, away from the bustle and noise of the street. The small garden is also where breakfast and lunch is served; we found the breakfast (not a buffet, customizable set menu) to be a very pleasant surprise, everything was tasty and freshly made (juice included). Another nicety was the afternoon tea & snack, which is finger-liking good (the pumpkin and jackfruit snack being our favourites). With that said, by far the best part of our stay was the staff (and manager/owner) - genuinely welcoming, eager to please and accommodating any request; they will ask for your name on the first day and use it for the rest of your stay; we've never felt so at home anywhere else in the world. For 5 days we felt not like pampered kings in a 5 star hotel, but like extended family visiting from abroad. The staff (I won't list names, they have all behaved the same  exemplary) have helped with anything we needed. Thank you so much, we are looking forward to visit again!

P.S.: I've nothing against big brand 5 star hotels 😁, just trying to emphasise that this hotel is different! (in a very personal and warm kind of way)
title: Wonderful hotel and kind people

text:
It is very easy to become suspicious of a place when all the reviews are so good. However, this hotel deserves all the praise it gets. You get all the perks of a hotel stay but the attentiveness of staying in a guest house.

Excellent location - You are very close to the centre, you can walk to many restaurants, cafes etc yet you are in a tranquil setting and can relax around the pool in peace and quiet.

Excellent service - the staff all behave like it is their business, they cannot do enough for you. They are the reason this place has a soul, unlike a typical resort/hotel.

Sleep quality - a combination of good staff (clean tidy spacious rooms) and great location (peaceful).

Breakfast was good.
Rooms are excellent - great size, modern, nice bathrooms and good shower. Also all the rooms face the pool and the paddy fields.

Service - we hired a bike on our first day but didn't end up using it until the second day. After leaving and looking at the bill I realised they didn't charge us for this day even though they had every right to do so. This tells you the kind of company you will keep if you choose to stay here, not only are the staff great but so are the owners.

Transfer - we asked for a price for a transfer to Rimba (Jimbaran) the price they quoted could not be beaten by all the other people we asked. Its a rarity when a hotel offers the most competitive transfer rates. Again this epitomises how they put the guest first.

I would not hesitate to return to this hotel if I was ever back in Bali. Including staying at Rimba this was our favourite hotel in Bali.
title: Believe the reviews

text: We spent 6 days in this beautiful hotel sorrounding by nature and positive energy. The owner Pande, his family and the whole staff are simply amazing, they take care of you all the time, providing all that you need to make your holiday great. They arranged our pick up at the airport and offered us a welcome drink followed by a typical balinese tea and sweets. The room was very spacious with a confortable giant bed, the bathroom was great with a big shower and all the amenities you need and more. Also the balcony was great with a relaxing view and no noise. Breakfast is delicious, consuming in the garden or in the room, ready exactly at the time you asked (we did tour almost every day and we had to be ready early for the pick up so it was a great plus also). The cleaning was absolutely perfect, they clean twice a day, this is a great plus for me. We definitely recommend this hotel, it has been the perfect choice that made our holiday start excellent. Pande has a special soul and spending a moment talking with him change your stay in a better way...trust me! Hope to come back to Bali to see them again and stay at Byasa.
title: Perfect Stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Chiara,

Warmest Greetings from Byasa Ubud
Thank you for taking your time to give us good comment and we are delighted to hear that you are happy during your stay at Byasa. 
We always keep our good services and keep maintain all the facilities as well.

We look forward to welcoming you again

Regards,
Pande & Ayu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The service at Byasa is like something I have never experienced. The staff will do absolutely anything to make your stay comfortable; including giving you an Indonesian phone with the reception on speed dial in case you need anything whilst in Ubud. A nice touch and one I have not seen before. 

The rooms are spacious and clean, good showers and fantastic views across the rice paddy from the top floor. The hotel itself is quiet with a lovely pool area, well kept garden. It’s super peaceful. 

The breakfast is also great, particularly shout out to the banana pancakes that were a real treat. 

I would recommend Byasa to anyone and everyone coming to Ubud even if it was 5x more expensive than it is. It’s superb and even better value. We’ll be back!

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Fraser,

Thank you for taking the time to review us on Trip Advisor.

I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, we take pride in delivering exceptional 

services and I will be sharing your feedback to continue to motivate and inspire the team.

We hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!

Best wishes,
Pande & Ayu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I was blown away by my stay at Byasa. It’s a beautiful little property just outside the madness of the main Ubud town. It’s quiet (you’ll get a fantastic night’s sleep), peaceful, but just a short walk or taxi ride to restaurants, spas and attractions. Everyone was so welcoming and warm - thank you to Ayu, Gus De and Darma for taking such good care of us. I was especially impressed that they had prepared a cellphone for each room which we could use to ring the hotel if we were lost or needed help when we were out. Ubers/Grab cars are not permitted in Ubud, but hotel staff would always call an affordable cab for us to take us places whenever we needed. The breakfast was fantastic and served in beautiful outdoor pavilions or breakfast areas by the pool and rice paddy, where we could enjoy nature while inhaling our delicious pancakes and eggs. The rooms were beautiful, spotless and had everything we needed. They’re eco-friendly too - I loved that they gave us a bottle of water at the start of our stay and provided a water cooler for refills rather than replace the plastic bottles daily. My only regret is that I missed afternoon tea, so I’ll definitely be back to stay the next time I’m in Ubud.
title: Absolutely perfect stay!

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Mannylam,

Warmest Greetings from Byasa Ubud
Thank you for taking your time to give us good comment and we are delighted to hear that you are happy during your stay at Byasa. 
We always keep our good services and keep maintain all the facilities as well.

We look forward to welcoming you again

Regards,
Pande & Ayu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We are just checking out of hotel now after a two week stay ... sad to be leaving the place. 

Hotel has only 9 rooms but this enables a very high level of care. Always greeted by all staff by name and with big genuine smiles. Nothing was any trouble to any member of the team, no matter what time of day it was. 

When I foolishly let the Bali sun get the better of me, rather than directing me to chemist for after sun, I was given freshly cut Aloe Vera from the garden to help with the burns. 

Location is a little outside Ubud centre, but within walking distance and when we didn’t fancy walking, hotel staff happy to provide us with lifts on scooters. 

Owners Pande & Ayu are as brilliant as the others members of staff, friendly, approachable and also Ayu is a very fine cook. 

Can’t recall a previous holiday where I couldn’t find a fault ... but Byasa have ticked every box.   

I would like to thank Pande, Ayu, Darma, Gusde & Dekyo and every other member of the team (apologies I can’t name-check everyone) ... they have made this 25th Wednesday Anniversary one to remember. 

Special mention to the room staff who made some wonderful animal sculptures from the towels.
title: Perfect.

text: We are staying at Byasa the 3rd time so far. This time it’s even better than before. Feel absolutely spoiled by staff and the owners. It is just a home away from home and even more. 🙏😊 We like the new little restaurant that they built this year. So comfortable seating and pleasant views for breakfast, lunch or dinner. We love you, that is why we are 3 weeks in Ubud 😉😉
title: Even better than before this time

text: Excellent place to stay. Large rooms, hosts are so cordial, restaurant, tea in afternoon, balconies off rooms. Can’t say enough about the lodgings or the staff. The staff arranged for drivers for sightseeing as well as picking us up airport. Always on time with a smile.
title: June 2018 visit for 4 nights

text: My sister and I visited Byasa and ended up extending our stay because it was so beautiful! All of the employees were courteous and super helpful. The breakfast every morning was delicious and home made. The room was clean and comfortable
title: Amazing views and relaxing oasis

text: The staff, rooms, amenities, food and location is what makes the stay perfect! They treat you like family. I made this my home base for 6 nights. First off, the staff is so warm and friendly and ensure that every aspect of your stay is looked after. Next, the rooms are huge, clean stocked up with essential amenities. The views from all the rooms overlook a swimming pool and rice field of a temple courtyard. If you are looking for a base to travel around Bali in any direction, this would be it! It's located a few meters from the center of ubud, away from all the hustle and bustle (because nestled in an inner road). The high rank of this hotel based on the reviews is very justified! Suksma!
title: The perfect stay!

text: We found this gem while looking for a hotel in Ubud which had good ratings and very good price. The location was behind another building which made it very quiet and peaceful. Very clean room with a view of a rice paddy next to it. The owners know how to run a treasure like this and make a name for themselves in a prime location like Ubud. They always offered advice of which restaurants were good and who had the shopping we were looking for it was nice to stay at this secret gem and we are glad we found it.
title: Hotel with soul

text: An impeccably maintained property , run by an extremely courteous couple , who ensure that each and every guest is made to feel special . The entire team at the hotel are the epitome of hospitality and leave nothing more to be desired . It's a home away from home and we've been more than satisfied with our stay and would definitely return to this paradise .
title: Exceptional Property

text: An impeccably maintained property , run by an extremely courteous couple , who ensure that each & every guest is made to feel special . The entire team at the hotel are the epitome of hospitality and leave nothing more to be desired . It's a home away from home and we've been more than satisfied with our stay and would definitely return to this paradise .
title: Exceptional Property

text:
I went with my mom and I had a very quiet and relaxing time.
The staff was friendly and kept a smile.
I enjoyed my first trip to Bali.
The driver was also very kind and nice.
I would go back to this hotel again if I go back to Bali.
The pool is also perfect.
엄마와 정말 행복한 시간 보낼수 있었어요
직원들은 모두 친절하였고 항상 미소를 지어주었어요
발리는 처음이였는데 너무 좋았어요
운전기사님 또한 매우 친절했어요
수영장 음식 모든게 완벽했어요 
다시 발리를 간다면 이 호텔에 다시 가겠어요 

고마워요 !
title: Perfect I love it !

text:
We stayed here for 4 nights in mid April 18, based on the multiple 5 star reviews and were not disappointed at all. 

All of the staff went above and beyond to make sure that our stay was wonderful, including ferrying a wayward teenager to our restaurant in Ubud central!

Breakfast and afternoon tea were a real bonus.

The photos are honest representation of the great accommodation. Very clean and comfortable. Great quiet pool with a peaceful setting of the rice fields. 

We will be returning here for our future stay in Ubud - excellent value for money and very friendly and welcoming staff!
title: Amazing Staff - Highly Recommended

text:
I’m so glad my husband and I came across the Byasa.
The hotel was in a great peaceful location about a 10 min walk into the centre.
All the staff were so welcoming and friendly, breakfast and afternoon tea all superb. 
Will definitely be back!
title: Fantastic Stay

text: What a great find.  Immaculate small hotel in a peaceful setting.  The rooms are large and we were lucky enough to have ones on the ground floor that opened right onto the pool.  The owners and staff are warm and friendly and will do everything to make your stay comfortable.
title: Immaculate oasis

text:
Wow. We were a little scared booking a relatively lesser known place in Bali but since this was a budget holiday we decided to risk it a little and book Byasa! But, my my... Byasa did not disappoint one bit.
We stayed for 3 days and it didn't feel like we were staying in a hotel. Every one of the staff led by Ayu to the other folks working with her really go the extra mile to make us happy. Ayu spoke in great detail about what's good in Ubud - how to get around - gave us motorbikes. Made arrangements for our veg breakfast.Took amazing care of us. 
The location is very close to Ubud's central market place and everything is under 3KM. 
Definitely suggest this place for a very laid back chilled Ubud-ish place to stay. This place definitely hits all the right spots!
title: Amazing Customer Service!

text:
This is the second  time in 2 years that I stayed here. and I will be back  next year. I love Ubud and this is such a happy place. The couple who own the property  are like  friends now and the staff are all so kind, friendly ; you feel like  you  are staying at a home. 
The homemade  breakfasts are amazing. That homemade  bread!!
The location is within walking distance  to the  heart of Ubud, which is perfect  because its away from  the business.  They  also provide drivers and scooters if you need. 
The  rooms are huge,  lovely views of rice fields  and its so relaxing. Ill be back next year  again!!
title: Second time staying it was so perfect

text:
I travelled 4th time in Bali- for a friends wedding. As a single female traveller I felt very safe and welcome. All the staff were amazing and went above and beyond. They  provided me with a mobile phone that I could use to call them and they would pick me up and drop me off in Ubud area- especially at night when I didn’t feel safe walking this was such an amazing customer service. The breakfasts were wonderful- home made bread.
And the staff found out it was my birthday and surprised me with a cake and song- such a lovely gesture. I will not stay anywhere else when I return to Ubud.
title: Couldn’t have asked for more.

text:
This is an amazing hotel with amazing staff. I cannot think of any improvements. It's next to a beautiful ricefield, where you can lounge by the pool and enjoy the view.
You hear nothing of the traffic from the street.

The rooms are huge, the beds and bathroom as well. Breakfast is nice and served in the garden (in your private gazebo) or on your balcony, what you want. 

The staff is soooo nice! They go out of their way to help you with every question. They even arranged a transport to our next hotel because we forgot to arrange that. 

Really a 10/10 experience. Don't hesitate and just book it. You will love it.
title: Perfection!

text: Byasa is so full of heart! A warm place to arrive to in the middle of the night. I had a late flight, Byasa organised a last minute pick up for me and i was warmly welcomed after the one hour drive. The service is so thoughtful and kind. There were frangipanis lining the walkway to my room. The room itself it wonderful- everything i needed. It is a small hotel and the amazing pool (overlooking the rice terrace) was never crowded and was off the doorstep of my ground floor room. They bought delicious banana pancakes to my room in the morning. They picked me up from town when i was too hot to walk. The staff make this place. They are so good at what they do. For the price this place is perfect. I have no hesitation in recommending.
title: An oasis!

text:
We stayed in this 9-rooms small hotel, just outside the caotic center of Ubud (15 minutes walk).
The hotel is run by a team that is very helpful (they will arrange a chauffeur to bring you to all kinds of sightseeing and unesco locations), very attentive and friendly. The hotel has a nice pool, small garden with gazebos in which you can have breakfast, lunch or dinner and overlooks a small area of rice fields.
The rooms are spacious and clean. If you are looking for a relaxed oasis to wake up in and return to after a sightseeing day, this little intimate family run hotel is highly recommended and offers great value for money.
title: Intimate and relaxed oasis

text:
We have stayed at the Byasa hotel during our one month trip in Indonesia and I can definitely say that this has been the most comfortable stay with the most delicious breakfast and the friendliest owner and the rest of the staff. They are ready to take an extra mile to make their clients feel like at home and have an unforgettable holiday. 
Rooms are super spacious with very big comfortable beds and big balconies with a view of rice paddies. 
The location of the hotel is very peaceful with the sounds of nature but also very close to the Yoga Barn and many restaurants and shops.
Overall, I couldn't recommend Byasa hotel more for an unforgettable time in Ubud and Bali.
title: Best stay in Bali

text: We stayed at the Byasa in January and couldn't have more pleased.  From the airport pick up, to the room, breakfast, tours and location everything was fantastic.  Always a warm smile (and umbrella) to meet you when you return in the afternoon or evening.  Having a loaner cell phone was great and especially helpful when trying to get a cab back to the hotel in the evening.  I would definitely return if I'm in Ubud again
title: great stay!

text: If you are looking for a relaxing place to stay in Ubud that is spotlessly clean and has the most amazing staff then this is the place for you. It is an oasis of calm and is well located - 10 mins walk from restaurants and about 30 min walk to the main part. But if you don't feel like walking they will happily give you a lift on a moped!  Everything about this place is perfect and I hope to get back here in the very near future!
title: Can't recommend enough

text: We lived there for a week during New Year 2018, we are well treated like family members as well as precious guests. Ayu and her team say good morning to us every day with great breakfast in the nice garden, and say good-night to us every evening when we returned to hotel. They provided us with many useful advice for how to spend the day and with transportation assistant. The hotel room, bedding, setting are all very comfortable. We will return in March again, and we look forward to seeing Ayu and the whole "family" just in few days!
title: Warmest Home in Ubud

text:
We chose to stay at the Byasa having read all the positive reviews on trip advisor. We were not disappointed - the rooms were perfect , modern  and spotlessly clean - in fact these rooms were better than the ones we stayed in at the 5 star Nusa Dua beach hotel.Ours on the ground floor stepped out straight into the lovely swimming pool. 
The owners and staff at the hotel couldn’t be more helpful - little touches like the free local mobile phone for use or just to ring the staff for advice while you are out and about is a lovely idea.  The hotel is a good 40 minutes walk from the centre of Ubud but there are plenty of restaurants within 5-10 minutes walk and taxis are plentiful and cheap if the heat and shopping gets too much.
We stayed 5 days and could easily have stayed longer.
Thanks for a lovely stay.
title: A most relaxing and friendly stay

text: My 9 night stay at Byasa Ubud was purely magical. I booked this trip during the less busy rainy season, and also happened to be on the island during the volcano eruption when flights were shut down for 2 days. You would never have known it from inside the walls of this tranquil paradise. The hearty and home made complimentary breakfast alone makes this air conditioned, mosquito free, impeccably clean, and peaceful yet centrally located hotel and it's poolside garden grounds a superb value. Every one of the 9 rooms has a spectacular view. You can enjoy your made to order breakfast daily wherever/whenever you'd like -poolside, garden terrace, or from your balcony. The staff is genuinely helpful and cheery. You get afternoon tea and cakes upon request for free as well. Other 5 star perks include turn down service, fresh towels shaped like animals daily, and the hotel can call you a taxi on a moment's notice. You get a cell phone with your room to make local calls as well! Or, in my case, to call the hotel to ask for a taxi to pick you up from a long hike. The staff goes above and beyond, and owners Pande and Ayu (who bakes the breakfast bread from scratch) are lovely hosts. I will make this trip an annual tradition now and defintely say at Byasa Ubud for many more years to come. Note: as a sole female traveller I felt very safe and taken care of staying here knowing the staff was just a phone call away and that there was always somebody on the desk ready to greet me when I got home not matter how late.
title: Purely Magical

text: The staff was genuinely friendly and accommodating; greeting us by our name, giving us a phone to use during our stay and organising pick-up to airport. The room was spacious and clean. Walking distance to monkey forest, yoga barn etc.
title: Genuinely friendly staff

text: My wife and I spent eight nights at Byasa Ubud mid-October.  Everything about the hotel, from the modern, clean, spacious rooms, to the lovely view of rice terraces with herons and kingfishers, to the friendliness of the owners, Pande and Ayu and the entire staff, more than met our high expectations (based on all the reviews). We did a few day trips and Pande helped plan the itineraries and offered friendly, knowledgeable drivers for us.  A few days into our three-week holiday I stepped into one of those gaping holes in the sidewalk at night and badly hurt a leg.  Staff were fantastic.  They were very sympathetic and accommodating, bringing meals/afternoon teas up to our third floor room, ordering in dinners for us, helping me up the stairs, and offering to take me to the clinic.  Pande drove us to one of the dances near the palace and even picked us up after the performance. Staff inquired about my leg daily and showed genuine concern. We would definitely stay at Byasa Ubud again if we make it back to Bali and we highly recommend it to everyone.  One could not hope to have nicer accommodation and more lovely owners and staff.
title: Unbeatable Accommodation and Service

text: This small family run hotel was the best hotel we stayed in throughout our trip in Indonesia.  The rooms are spacious and extremely clean and above all comfortable.  Great beds and air conditioning.  It was so nice to wake up each morning to a quiet view of the rice fields and sit on the spacious balcony and enjoy coffee.  Breakfast was simple but delicious.  Pool very clean.  Above all, the owners Pande and Ayu and their staff went above and beyond to organize and assist us with our holiday in Ubud and our special interests we had.  They are absolutely fantastic.  Hospitality beyond compare.  We highly recommend this hotel.
title: Outstading Botique Hotel

text:
We had a really great stay at the Byasa when we were visiting Ubud. 

The service is outstanding! All members of the staff is very friendly and helpful. They helped us arrange a trip around Ubud with a very friendly driver. 
The staff were always available and made sure that we had a great time. 

The rooms are VERY clean and comfortable. The garden is lovely and it´s nice to enjoy the good breakfast in the gazebo. Excellent pool area with ricefields in the background and new towels every day. In the afternoon they serve afternoon tea with som sweeties which is good after a day on Ubuds streets. 

The location is good, only ten minutes walk to the central parts of Ubud and some good restaurants. 

This hotel was the best hotel on our stay in Bali. What I liked most about it is the friendly people that work there and the owners. I can only agree with all the previous reviews, it´s a really good place to stay in when visiting Ubud.
title: The best hotel in Bali!

text: Room, grounds and pool extremely clean. Owners are the perfect hosts and couldn't help you enough. Staff very friendly, helpful and courteous. Excellent hotel for brilliant price. Beautiful grounds. Very comfy beds with quality linen. Breakfast delicious. This place is more like a 5 star hotel! The owners literally have everything spot on. We recommend you hire bike (electric bike hire near by) or use transport to and from Ubud centre. Would definitely return. Beautiful weather, loved Ubud.
title: Beyond expectations... Absolutely perfect!

text: Room was bright and clean...  Very well-kept and well-priced.  The staff were amazing.  They went above and beyond my expectations helping me with anything I needed and always making sure I was happy and comfortable.  The location is great.. just around the corner from the main strip while still being relaxed and quiet.  Next to a rice field, a row of ducks was always within sight.  I fell asleep to the distant sound of frogs and crickets :)  I will definitely stay here again.
title: Best service I've ever had.

text:
Ein kleines gemütliches Hotel mit großen und sauberen Zimmern. Besonders macht das Resort aber die netten Mitarbeiter.  Sie sind immer hilfsbereit und kommen einen entgegen ohne aufdringlich zu sein. Wir sind sehr zufrieden und würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
Eines der besten Nasi Goreng!!!
Die Lage ist auch perfekt!
title: Sehr nette Gastgeber! :)

text: Ci sarei dovuto andare nel luglio 2020, poi purtroppo la pandemia me lo ha impedito... tutti gli hotel che avevo prenotato a Bali mi hanno rimborsato tranne il Byasa Ubud che mi ha detto che avrei potuto sfruttare la prenotazione entro un anno. Peccato che non sia più stato possibile viaggiare. Quasi 300 euro che si sono tenuti... senza propormi nessuna proroga...
title: Comportamento poco corretto

owner_response.text:

text:
去年の6月に２泊しましたが、今でもこのホテルに泊まった事が良い思い出です。
美しい田んぼビュー、かわいい小鳥たち、青くてキレイなプール。夜は虫の鳴き声を聴きながら就寝。朝は庭園で大満足の朝食。スタッフも皆、すごく優しかった。ありがとうございました。
title: とても癒されました

text:

Thank you again for your wonderful review and for having allowed us to be part of your holiday in Ubud.

text: Naar aanleiding, reviews van andere reizigers, hebben wij deze accommodatie geboekt via Booking.com. Wij kunnen alleen maar zeggen Top accommodatie. Deze accommodatie bestaat uit 9 kamers, uitkijkend op zwembad en rijstveld. Personeel; vriendelijk, behulpzaam denken mee. Kamer schoon ziet er heel goed uit, Airco niet onbelangrijk doet het heel goed. Sanitair schoon. Tussen 15:00 uur en !8:00 uur High Tea koffie of thee met een heerlijke versnapering. Ontbijt ruim voldoende. Wij gaan zeker nog een keer terug.
title: Byasa Ubud is een kleinschalig zeer vriendelijk Hotel

Thank you so much for your great feedback and recommendation and looking forward to welcome you back to our home at Byasa. 

Best Regards,
Pande & Ayu

text: Rien à dire, l’un des meilleurs hôtels de notre séjour tout est parfait la propreté le petit déjeuner frais et goûteux, la gentillesse du personnel qui est juste incroyable. Foncez!! Meilleur qualité prix!
title: PARFAIT

text: 우리는 이틀간 브야사에서 지냈습니다. 호텔 등급이 무색할 만큼 완벽하고 좋은 룸컨디션과 청소를 경험했고, 작은 부분까지 섬세하게 신경써주신 스탭들께 고맙습니다. 더 오래 머물고 싶었던 곳!! 사랑스러운 모디?가 계속 건강하게 지내길 바랍니다~! 다음에 다시 우붓을 찾고 싶네요~💚

text:
こちらのホテルのフロントに着いた時は、ここがフロント？？と少し不安になりましたが、部屋からの景色が素敵で、静かで落ち着いたホテルでした。
　４人だったため、送迎をお願いしたところ、タクシーを自分で見つけてくださいとのことでした。タクシーとの交渉は、とても疲れるので、ホテルがよく使うタクシーを呼んでくれるか、ココマート辺りまでフリーの送迎があれば、またリピートしたいです。バイクの送迎は、一人ずつになってしまうので、二人なら順番にしてもらえると思います。
　スタッフの雰囲気や景観、部屋の広さなど素敵なホテルなので、おすすめです。
title: 景色が素敵

owner_response.text:
Dear seachan445,
 
Thank you for your feedback, also thank you for choosing Byasa Ubud for your stay. We are happy to know that you had a great moment with us, your feedback is valuable for us to keep increase service quality in the future. We look forward to welcoming you again in the nearest future. 

Best Regards

text:
Eind mei hier 5 nachten verbleven.

Het bestaat dus echt: dit is het hotel waar ALLES klopt. 

Het hotel, met mooie tuin, heeft slechts 9 kamers, perfect gesitueerd aan een rijstveld dat behoort bij de naastgelegen tempel. Wij hadden de middelste kamer op de begane grond die direct uitkwam op het zwembad.

De kamer was ruim, smaakvol ingericht, met goede bedden en een heerlijke regendouche met een grote waterdruk.

Er is een uitstekend keuze-ontbijt, waarbij je 's avonds je keuze doorgeeft voor de volgende ochtend. Je gebruikt je ontbijt in het buitenrestaurant. Iedere ochtend werd het gebracht door de altijd vrolijke Dharma, die ervoor zorgde dat we de dag met een gezellig praatje startten.

Naast de prima entourage is het vooral de persoonlijke aandacht van de eigenaren Pande en Ayu en al hun personeel dat ervoor zorgt dat dit hotel de perfectie nadert!
Ze geven tips waar je wat aan hebt: waar je het meeste geld uit de pinautmaat krijgt, waar je goed kunt eten en geven ideeën voor de beste trips en regelen die voor je.

Omdat ik een keer authentiek Balinees wilde eten heeft Pande dat voor me gekocht: een soort van nasi campur met allerlei langzaam gegaarde zaken erin , zoals een ei dat eerst gekookt was, gepeld en daarna nog een nacht doorgegaard was. 
Nog nooit zoiets geproefd, maar het was heerlijk.

Dus: 
- wil je in alle rust van je hotel kunnen genieten, maar ook niet te ver van de bars en restaurants zitten van Ubud;
- wil een 5-sterrengevoel door een persoonlijk uitgeserveerd ontbijt, een turndown-service en 2x schoonmaak van je kamer per dag;
- wil je persoonlijke aandacht en een oprecht vriendelijke benadering, zonder dat het opdringerig wordt;
- wil je later in de middag lekker bijkomen bij het zwembad met de complimentary afternoon tea...

..dan is dit je hotel.
title: Fantastisch!

text:
Byasa bedeutet auf balinesisch so viel wie "nichts besonderes" und ist genau genommen der falsche Name für dieses Hotel. Denn ganz im Gegenteil ist das Byasa mehr ein Diamant, unscheinbar versteckt in der zweiten Reihe und von der Straße aus (leider) kaum zu erahnen, welcher insbesondere von der tollen Atmosphäre angrenzend am Reisfeld, viel mehr jedoch von den unglaublich netten Mitarbeitern und besonders dem herzlichen Betreiberpaar Ayu und Pande lebt.

Schon der Empfang bei der Anreise mit Begrüßungsgetränk und nettem Austausch mit Ayu ließ einen angenehmen Aufenthalt erwarten. Spätestens jedoch, als die Mitarbeiter uns schon nach kurzer Zeit mit Namen begrüßten und sich stets mit einem Lächeln nach unserem Wohlergehen erkundigten, war uns klar, dass wir uns mit dem Byasa (auch aufgrund der bisherigen Bewertungen) genau die richtige Unterkunft für unseren fünftägigen Aufenthalt zu Zweit in Ubud ausgesucht hatten. Die hier eingestellten Bilder sind repräsentativ, auch den genannten positiven Bewertungen können wir ausnahmslos zustimmen. (Wenn man noch etwas verbessern wollte und wirklich das kleinste Haar in der Suppe suchte, könnte das ansonsten üppige Frühstück (Ei nach Wunsch zubereitet + Pancake + Früchteteller oder Smoothie + Kaffee oder Tee) bspw. mit Müsli, Joghurt o.ä. noch etwas abwechslungsreicher gestaltet werden - auf Nachfrage erhielten wir z.B. statt Ei auch Brot mit Marmeladenaufstrichen. Außerdem könnten die aus der Küche nach Wunsch zum Mittag- oder Abendessen zusätzlich bestellbaren Gerichte etwas größer sein (oder man bestellt einfach gleich 2 Portionen, denn die Portonspreise sind angemessen ;-) ).

Gut zu wissen ist: Wie wir bei ausgiebigen Gesprächen mit Pande erfahren konnten, ist es ihm wichtig, nicht in den Preiskampf mit der großen Hotel-Konkurrenz in und um Ubud zu gehen, sondern sich mehr durch einen außerordentlichen Service (u.a. zwei Mal Service am Tag (Housekeeping + Turndown-Service), Nachmittagstee/-kaffee oder auch die besondere Sauberkeit in den Zimmern und in der kleinen Anlage, etc. - Service also, welcher in jedem Fall auf/über dem Niveau anderer 5-Sterne-Hotels in Bali liegt) zu differenzieren und bei den Gästen zu Punkten. Denn sein Ansinnen ist es, damit nicht nur den Gästen etwas Gutes zu tun, sondern auch seine lokale Verantwortung wahrzunehmen, den Mitarbeiter/innen eine langfristige Perspektive im ansonsten von Gelegenheitsjobs geprägten balinesischen Arbeitsmarkt zu geben.
Und genau das merkt man: Hier ist der Gast König!

Nicht unerwähnt bleiben darf abschließend der selbstlose Einsatz Pandes nach einem kleinen Zwischenfall unsererseits: Aufgrund eines Missverständnisses zwickte mich ein Haushund (kein Straßenhund, der jedoch - wie sich später herausstellte - in den Monaten davor schon andere Leute gebissen hatte) abends in Ubud ins Schienbein.
Aufgrund der unklaren Lage und der Unsicherheit bzgl. Tollwut in Bali entschieden wir uns, trotz der minimalen Wunde, noch nachts zur Abklärung und Behandlung ins Krankenhaus nach Denpasar zu fahren, woraufhin sich Pande unverzüglich als Fahrer bereitstellte und während der Behandlung für eventuelle Übersetzungen und Hilfen zur Seite stand. Anschließend erkundigte er sich in den Folgetagen sogar beim Hundebesitzer über den Gesundheitszustand sowie Impfzustand des Hundes und holte außerdem im Bekanntenkreis noch eine ärztliche Zweitmeinung ein, um uns das bestmögliche Gefühl beim weiteren Vorgehen bei der Behandlung zu geben.

Noch heute sind wir unendlich dankbar für seine Hilfe in dieser ungewissen Zeit in einem fremden Land, die es uns wenigstens noch etwas ermöglichte, den restlichen Urlaub zu genießen. Sehr gerne werden wir bei unserem nächsten Urlaub wieder im Byasa einchecken und können das Hotel bis dahin wärmstens und ausnahmslos weiterempfehlen!
title: 3,5-Sterne Hotel mit 5+-Sterne-Niveau!!

text:
Byasa es un lugar al que siempre querrías volver. Leímos las opiniones, todas positivas. Reservamos por una noche a pesar de que necesitábamos dos. 
Ellos se encargaron de recomendarnos alojamiento para el segundo día . Incluso como al final se anuló una reserva, nos avisaron para que pudiéramos quedarnos, arreglando todo con el otro hotel y sin coste para nosotros.
Te llaman por tu nombre porque quieren que sientas que estás en casa. Con nosotros lo lograron.
Desayuno excelente. De hecho, el mejor de todos los que tomamos en este viaje. Esos pancakes son asombrosos. El pan de las tostadas lo elaboran ellos. 
La piscina es una delicia. Está al lado de un campo de arroz, con unas vistas preciosas.
Las habitaciones como el resto, super limpias. Habitaciones grandes. Camas enormes. Todo al detalle. Ponen flores y todo lo que puedas necesitar, incluyendo agua de cortesía. 
Suelen revisar que está todo ok varias veces al día. 
A nosotros nos sorprendieron dejándonos las toallas con formas de conejo guerrero. 
Los dueños son super agradables y se desviven por que estés bien y disfrutes de Ubud y de Byasa.
A media tarde te ofrecen pastas y té helado. 
Recomiendo al 100% este hotel. 
Si vuelvo alguna vez a Ubud, volveremos a Byasa. 
Uyun, Cabax ..... Millones de gracias por todo!
title: Uno de los mejores hoteles en los que he estado

text: Siamo arrivati al Byasa con aspettative molto alte dato le belle recensioni, e questo posto è riuscito a superarle! Le stanze sono belle, grandi e pulitissime (vengono pulite almeno due volte al giorno) e tutte dotate di terrazzo con bellissima vista sulle risaie (le foto non rendono!). La posizione comoda per muoversi sia a piedi che in moto. Il cibo è qualcosa di speciale, ancora ci manca la magnifica colazione indonesiana inclusa nel prezzo, per non parlare dei fantastici Lumpia! Consigliamo vivamente di fare una cena o un pranzo qui (noi ne abbiamo fatti più di uno). Consigliamo anche il noleggio delle moto, tenute bene e a buon prezzo. La piscina è pulitissima, fresca e la zona esterna bellissima! Ma veniamo alla parte migliore di questo posto: lo staff. Personale fantastico che ha reso la nostra vacanza ancora più speciale, grazie di tutto ancora. Sicuramente il miglior posto dove siamo stati durante il nostro soggiorno in Indonesia, Byasa ed il suo staff resteranno per sempre nei nostri cuori! Michela e Matteo
title: Byasa, un posto stupendo

text: We werden enorm hartelijk ontvangen in dit mooie hotelletje (met 9 kamers) dat net buiten het drukke centrum van Ubud gelegen is. De straat lijkt zeer druk, maar het hotel is achterin gelegen, zeer verrassend tussen de rijstvelden. Een oase van rust vlakbij het hectische centrum. De hele staf was heel lief bezorgd om mijn vrouw die ziek werd, plots koorts (theetjes brengen en dergelijke, ‘s nachts met thermometer langskomen etc.). Degelijke artsenpraktijk op 200 ometer, kan dus van pas komen (Toya). Als je eens geen zin hebt om de oase te verlaten: ze hebben heerlijke gerechten en aan het zwembad kan je rustig ontspannen. Zeer proper hotel, uiterst vriendelijke en behulpzame mensen; waren heel eerlijk om ons af te raden om de scooter te nemen (geen ervaring), en zetten ons dan zelf met de scooter af op een strategische plek. Echte aanrader!

text:
Wij hebben vijf nachten overnacht in dit fantastische hotel. Het personeel heeft ons meer dan vriendelijk ontvangen met informatie over de stad Ubud en de activiteiten/bezienswaardigheden.

De kamer heeft een moderne sfeer en voorziet in alle benodigdheden. We kregen zelfs een mobiele telefoon op onze kamer om contact te houden met de receptie.

Het ontbijt was erg goed geregeld en vooral lekker.
Elke avond kon je het ontbijt doorgeven en ‘s ochtends stond het dan klaar op de afgesproken tijd. 

Het zwembad is ruim, rustig en mooi gelegen aan rijstvelden.

Wat deze accomodatie zo fantastisch maakt is zeker het personeel. Dek Yo en zijn andere collega van de receptie vingen ons constant op met een gezellige praatje en waren steeds geïnteresseerd in hoe onze dag was verlopen.

Toen wij aan het eind van ons verblijf geen taxi konden regelen, was de eigenaar zo lief om ons naar onze volgende accommodatie te brengen (Nusa Dua, 2 uur rijden).

Wij hebben intens genoten van dit hotel en het fantastische personeel en raden het iedereen aan om hier te verblijven in Ubud.
title: Perfect verblijf

owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Merel,

Thank you for taking the time to review us on Trip Advisor.

I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, we take pride in delivering exceptional services and I will be sharing your feedback to continue to motivate and inspire the team.

We hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you back again soon!

Best wishes,
Pande & Ayu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Siamo andati nella splendida Ubud in altissima stagione e abbiamo adorato questo angolo di tranquillità. Ubud si sviluppa attraverso una strada lunga in lieve salita che porta ai templi principali e al palazzo reale, e Byasa si trova ai piedi di questa strada: ma dopo alcuni giorni ci siamo resi conto che - come suggeriscono molti forum - soggiornare alle porte di questa via trafficatissima è una scelta vincente. In una decina di minuti a
piedi si arriva facilmente alla zona dei locali e la distanza è ripagata da una pace che non ha uguali. Tutte le stanze, ampie e curate, sono affacciate sulle risaie, così come il giardino e ci si addormenta tra il rumore dei grilli e delle rane. La struttura è molto pulita, con ogni comfort. La parte migliore è lo staff, gentilissimo e premuroso. Ci ha addirittura fornito un cellulare con sim indonesiana perché potessimo chiamare l’hotel in caso di necessità. 
La colazione è deliziosa e freschissima, servita con cura nel giardino con piscina e gazebo. Non abbiamo avuto tempo di farlo,
ma diversi ospiti ci hanno detto che la cena cucinata da Ayu in hotel è da provare. Ci siamo trovati così bene che alla fine della nostra vacanza, anziché tornare sulla costa, abbiamo deciso di restare a Ubud proprio per soggiornare a Byasa, dove ci siamo sentiti coccolati e in pace. 
La struttura ha a disposizione a
prezzi modici anche degli scooter a noleggio, il miglior modo per girare in città. Struttura perfetta per piccoli gruppi di amici e per coppie.
title: Buen retiro

owner_response.text:
Cara signora Micol P,

Grazie per aver dedicato del tempo per scrivere la tua recensione sul tuo soggiorno in questo viaggio. È stato un

piacere per noi averti a Byasa Ubud. È bello sapere quanto ci hai amato e io lo sono

certo non possiamo aspettare di averti di nuovo con noi.

Si prega di rimanere in contatto con noi e facci sapere se possiamo aiutare in ogni caso per le vostre vacanze.
Non vediamo l'ora di darti il ​​benvenuto di nuovo.

I migliori saluti,

Pande & Ayu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: モンキーフォーレストからおよそ徒歩20分、ウブドの中央から南側に位置する隠れ家的ホテルです。何がすごいって、働いている方達の優しさとサービスが5つ星ホテル並み！低価格、美味しい朝食、素敵な景色、静けさ、心地よく清潔なお部屋、すべて揃ってます。滞在中は手渡されるホテルの携帯でいつでもどこでも街中でも連絡がとれ、困ったときは助けてくれます。あんまり部屋数が多くないので、人気が出すぎて予約取りにくくなるのは残念ですが、感謝の意を込めて投稿します。
title: バリ島ウブドの隠れ家ホテル

owner_response.text:
Eriさん、

この旅行の滞在に関するあなたのレビューを書く時間をとっていただきありがとうございます。それは

Byasa Ubudでお会いしましょう。あなたが私たちをどれだけ愛しているかを知って

あなたが私たちと一緒に帰るのを待っているわけではありません。

とにかくあなたの休日のために助けることができる場合は、私たちと連絡を取り、私たちに知らせてください。
私たちはあなたを再び歓迎することを楽しみにしています。

宜しくお願いします、
Pande & Ayu
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: ホテルの人がとても親切で笑顔で話しかけてくれるのでとても居心地がいいです。お部屋も広くて見晴らしもよく開放感があります。宿泊者が出かけた所で困らないように携帯を渡してくれて困った事があったら電話すればホテルの人がかわって説明してくるようになっていてとても安心です。コストパフォーマンスも素晴らしいホテルでした。
title: 居心地のいいホテル
